inputs.text:
one continuous single-line drawing (single unbroken stroke), uniform line width, extremely minimal, crisp black line on pure white background, flat contour only, no shading.

Literal but simplified portrait of name, a job_title. Subtle posture and attitude imply: behaviors_short. Use perspective view with person_positioning so the person remains the dominant focal point.

Minimal work environment drawn with the same continuous line: chair, desk, computer; subtle role-specific wall artifact(s) for job_title; sparse contextual hints reflecting needs_wants_short and work style. Keep environment strictly secondary, fewer lines than the person, abundant negative space, no distractions, no text.

color, grayscale gradients, shading, shadows, cross-hatching, sketchy strokes, multiple strokes, broken lines, variable line thickness, texture, depth, lighting, 3D, fill areas, noise, blur, text, words, logo, watermark, signature, clutter, busy background, complex scene, photorealism, painterly, hatching, stippling, tone, drop shadows
